name: Sidi Bou Saïd
description: A picturesque village, a gem known for blue-and-white architecture, Mediterranean views, charming cafes, art galleries, and peaceful historic streets.

name: Sydney Beaches & Harbour Tour
description: Visit Bondi Beach, the Sydney Opera House, and Harbour Bridge. Great for photos and ocean views.

name: New York City Highlights Tour
description: See top NYC sights like Times Square, Central Park, and the Statue of Liberty. Perfect for first-time visitors.

name: Tokyo Old & New Tour
description: Explore ancient temples and high-tech districts in Tokyo. Try sushi at a local restaurant and see the famous Shibuya Crossing.

name: Rome
description: The Eternal City, known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and iconic landmarks like the Colosseum, Vatican City, and Trevi Fountain. A cultural and historical hub with over 2,500 years of legacy!

name: Dougga Tour
description: Explore the ancient ruins of Dougga, from the Roman theatre to the Temple of Saturn. Discover mosaics, monuments, and stunning views of the Atlas Mountains.

name: Palestine: A Journey Through History
description: From Gaza’s vibrant streets to ancient olive groves. Discover sacred lands filled with history, resilience, and deep connection.

name: Algerian Sahara Exploration
description: Vast dunes, ancient rocks, and Tuareg culture, immersing yourself in the desert’s tranquil beauty and rich history.

name: Dubai City Tour
description: See the Burj Khalifa, Palm Jumeirah, and Dubai Mall. Option to visit the desert for a safari.

name: Bangkok Street Food Tour
description: Taste delicious Thai street food like pad thai, mango sticky rice, and more. Visit lively night markets.

name: Iceland Golden Circle Tour
description: See geysers, waterfalls, and the famous Blue Lagoon. Great for nature lovers.

name: Marrakech Market Tour
description: Explore colorful souks, try Moroccan tea, and visit historic palaces. A feast for the senses.

name: Kyoto Temples & Gardens Tour
description: Visit beautiful temples, bamboo forests, and traditional tea houses. Peaceful and scenic.

name: Barcelona Gaudi Tour
description: See the Sagrada Familia, Park Güell, and other famous Gaudi landmarks. Full of unique architecture.

name: Amsterdam Canals & Museums Tour
description: Take a boat ride through the canals and visit the Van Gogh Museum. A perfect mix of culture and fun.

name: Athens Ancient Ruins & Acropolis Tour
description: Explore the Acropolis and Parthenon, and walk through the ancient Agora. Discover the cradle of Western civilization.

name: Machu Picchu Inca Trail Tour
description: Hike the famous Inca Trail and explore the lost city of the Incas. A breathtaking adventure in the Peruvian mountains.

name: Cairo Pyramids & Egyptian Museum Tour
description: Marvel at the Great Pyramids of Giza and the Sphinx, then visit the Egyptian Museum to see ancient treasures.

name: London Historic Landmarks Tour
description: Explore London's iconic landmarks including the Tower of London, Buckingham Palace, and Big Ben.

name: Petra Jordan Ancient City Tour
description: Discover the Rose City of Petra, a UNESCO World Heritage site with stunning rock-cut architecture.

name: Helsinki Archipelago Tour
description: Cruise through Helsinki's beautiful archipelago, stopping at charming islands and enjoying stunning sea views.

name: Argentina & Culture Tour
description: Experience the heart of Argentina’s culture with a guided tour through Buenos Aires' vibrant neighborhoods.

name: Seoul Palaces & Modern Culture Tour
description: Visit the Gyeongbokgung Palace and Bukchon Hanok Village, then explore Seoul’s modern shopping districts.

name: Dubai Desert Safari & Adventure Tour
description: Go on a thrilling desert safari with dune bashing, camel rides, and a traditional Bedouin-style dinner.

name: Singapore Gardens by the Bay Tour
description: Visit the stunning Gardens by the Bay, featuring the iconic Supertree Grove and Cloud Forest. Enjoy a light show in the evening amidst beautiful flora.

name: Istanbul Bosphorus Cruise Tour
description: Experience a scenic cruise on the Bosphorus Strait, witnessing the stunning skyline of Istanbul. Visit historic palaces and enjoy traditional Turkish tea.

name: Cape Town Scenic Tour
description: See Table Mountain, penguins at Boulders Beach, and stunning coastal views. Includes a cable car ride.

name: Paris Night Tour: Eiffel Tower & Montmartre
description: See the Eiffel Tower light up at night, then explore the charming streets of Montmartre. Enjoy a coffee at a cozy café with great views.

name: Rio de Janeiro City Tour
description: Visit Christ the Redeemer, Sugarloaf Mountain, and Copacabana Beach. Experience Rio’s vibrant culture.

name: Venice Gondola & Canals Tour
description: Take a romantic gondola ride through Venice’s canals and visit St. Mark’s Square. Includes gelato tasting.

name: Kuala Lumpur Urban Exploration & Culture Tour
description: Experience the stunning skyline of Kuala Lumpur, home to the world-renowned **Petronas Twin Towers** and the futuristic **KL Tower**. Afterward, immerse yourself in the city's rich heritage with a visit to the **Batu Caves**, an ancient Hindu temple complex, followed by a stroll through **Central Market** for local crafts and cuisine.
